info.name: texture MIPmap bug
info.description:
The true average of 256x256 RGB noise map is 127.16, 127.16, 127.55.
But ultimate MIPmap level is  123, 123, 124 on Windows/Angle (direct3D) 
and 126, 126, 127 on OpenGL (windows or linux).
8bits cascading cause errors, but 3.6 * more in Angle.

renderpass.code:
void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 U )
{
#if 1
    O = textureLod(iChannel0,U,100.);     // display max LOD ( = average )
#else
    O = texelFetch(iChannel0,ivec2(U),0); // display raw texture 256x256
#endif
}
renderpass.name: Image
